title: Desecrating Solomon The Trilogy: Inspired By True Events
description: She was prepared for twelve years to secure the final sacrifice Evil keeps a formidable schedule in Weston, West Virginia. But this seventh year, a desecration unlike any before is scheduled to ravage the town. And Solomon Gorge is lured to the harrowing event by the screams of a woman named Silence.
author: Lucian Bane
